verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Come Thou Almighty King, Help us Your praise to sing. We’re here to praise, Father all glorious, O’er all victorious, Come and reign over us, Ancient of Days.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Come Thou Incarnate Word, Gird on Your mighty sword. Our prayer attend: Come, and Your people bless, And give Your word success, Spirit of holiness, On us descend.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Come Holy Comforter, Your sacred witness bear. In this glad hour, You who almighty are, Now rule in every heart, And never from us depart, Spirit of power.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}To the Great One in Three, Eternal praises be. Hence evermore, His sovereign majesty May we in glory see And to eternity Love and adore.{/lang-eng}
